comments:
Build ID: I20070621-1340

Steps To Reproduce:

I don't have a simple example to show this, but the function CompositeCPPClassTemplate.instantiate can recurse infinitely causing a stack overflow.

The problem seems to be that the function CPPTemplate.matchTemplatePartialSpecialization (called at line 81 of CompositeCPPClassTemplate.java) returns the template passed to it, if template.getPartialSpecializations() returns null. The function then calls itself with the same arguments.
